TopicTitle: Kerbal is labelled as debris I cannot control

Articles.Content: Well I was on minimums in a chair and he popped out but now he is uncontrollable I cannot do anything at all!
See "Frozen or Stuck Kerbals on EVA" in the Cross Platform Issues Thread. There's a link to it in the stickied Known Issues & Self-Help thread, which also contains a lot of other helpful information.

Yes indeed. He should be easy to fix. Master Tao is pointing you at the right place. Feel free to post if you're having problems following the directions on the thread.

Good luck,

-Claw
